system
Interface Map

All Known Implementing Classes:
MapImpl
public interface Map

This interface represents the map of the world known by the system. It knows all paths in the world. Obstacles that can occur are also taken into account.

Author:
Simon Busard

Remove an obstacle at coordinates

Precondition:

Postcondition
